txt.en: Candúr can be found in the village of Ethring.\n\nYou should speak with Candúr.

'I heard you were the one who defeated The Weft-mother. The people here have been talking about you. They need good stories to get them through these dark times.\n\n'It is unfortunate that there are dreadful stories of a beastly spider of immense size stalking in the Vale. This so called Scythe-jaw fills the folks of Ethring with dread. I know the Vale owes you much thanks for your deeds. I hope that you can once again aid us.'
Roving Threat: Scythe-jaw, the Dread Spider
After the events in the Nimrond caverns, Ringló Vale faces continued threats, including Scythe-jaw, the Weft-mother's greatest spawn.
'We all owe you thanks for defeating Scythe-jaw before any more fell victim to its deadly bite.'
Scythe-jaw can be found somewhere in Ringló Vale.\n\nYou should defeat Scythe-jaw.
